021import net.kyori.adventure.text.Component;
022import net.tnemc.core.currency.format.CurrencyFormatter;
023import net.tnemc.core.currency.format.FormatRule;
024import net.tnemc.core.menu.handlers.StringSelectionHandler;
025import net.tnemc.menu.core.builder.IconBuilder;
026import net.tnemc.menu.core.callbacks.page.PageOpenCallback;
027import net.tnemc.menu.core.handlers.MenuClickHandler;
028import net.tnemc.menu.core.icon.action.impl.ChatAction;
029import net.tnemc.menu.core.icon.action.impl.DataAction;
030import net.tnemc.menu.core.icon.action.impl.RunnableAction;
031import net.tnemc.menu.core.icon.action.impl.SwitchPageAction;
032import net.tnemc.menu.core.viewer.MenuViewer;
033import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
034import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.message.MessageData;
035import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.message.MessageHandler;
036
037import java.util.Collections;
038import java.util.LinkedList;
039import java.util.Optional;
040import java.util.UUID;
041import java.util.function.Consumer;
042
043/**
044 * FormatSelectionPage
045 *
046 * @author creatorfromhell
047 * @since 0.1.3.0
048 */
049public class FormatSelectionPage {
050
051  protected final String returnMenu;
052  protected final String menuName;
053  protected final int menuPage;
054  protected final int returnPage;
055  protected final String formatID;
056  protected final String formatPageID;
057  protected final int menuRows;
058
059  protected final Consumer<StringSelectionHandler> selectionListener;
060
061  public FormatSelectionPage(final String formatID, final String returnMenu, final String menuName,
062                             final int menuPage, final int returnPage, final String formatPageID,
063                             final int menuRows, final Consumer<StringSelectionHandler> selectionListener) {
064
065    this.returnMenu = returnMenu;
066    this.menuName = menuName;
067    this.menuPage = menuPage;
068    this.returnPage = returnPage;
069    this.formatID = formatID;
070    this.formatPageID = formatPageID;
071
072    //we need a controller row and then at least one row for items.
073    this.menuRows = (menuRows <= 1)? 2 : menuRows;
074    this.selectionListener = selectionListener;
075  }
076
077  public void handle(final PageOpenCallback callback) {
078
079    final Optional<MenuViewer> viewer = callback.getPlayer().viewer();
080    if(viewer.isPresent()) {
081
082      final UUID id = viewer.get().uuid();
083
084      final int page = (Integer)viewer.get().dataOrDefault(formatPageID, 1);
085      final int items = (menuRows - 1) * 9;
086      final int start = ((page - 1) * 9);
087      final int maxPages = (CurrencyFormatter.rules().size() / items) + (((CurrencyFormatter.rules().size() % items) > 0)? 1 : 0);
088
089      final int prev = (page <= 1)? maxPages : page - 1;
090      final int next = (page >= maxPages)? 1 : page + 1;
091      if(maxPages > 1) {
092
093        callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("RED_WOOL", 1)
094                                                           .customName(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.Shared.PreviousPageDisplay"), id))
095                                                           .lore(Collections.singletonList(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.Shared.PreviousPage"), id))))
096                                           .withActions(new DataAction(formatPageID, prev), new SwitchPageAction(menuName, menuPage))
097                                           .withSlot(0)
098                                           .build());
099
100        callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("GREEN_WOOL", 1)
101                                                           .customName(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.Shared.NextPageDisplay"), id))
102                                                           .lore(Collections.singletonList(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.Shared.NextPage"), id))))
103                                           .withActions(new DataAction(formatPageID, next), new SwitchPageAction(menuName, menuPage))
104                                           .withSlot(8)
105                                           .build());
106      }
107
108      callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("ARROW", 1)
109                                                         .customName(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.MyEco.Format.Space"), id))
110                                                         .lore(Collections.singletonList(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.MyEco.Format.Add"), id))))
111                                         .withActions(new SwitchPageAction(menuName, menuPage))
112                                         .withClick((click)->formatAddClick(click, " "))
113                                         .withSlot(2)
114                                         .build());
115
116      callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("ARROW", 1)
117                                                         .customName(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.MyEco.Format.OwnDisplay"), id))
118                                                         .lore(Collections.singletonList(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.MyEco.Format.Own"), id))))
119                                         .withActions(new ChatAction((message)->{
120
121
122                                                        if(message.getPlayer().viewer().isPresent() && !message.getMessage().isEmpty()) {
123
124                                                          addToClickData(message.getPlayer().viewer().get(), message.getMessage());
125                                                          return true;
126                                                        }
127
128                                                        message.getPlayer().message("Enter your own text to add to the format:");
129                                                        return false;
130
131                                                      }), new RunnableAction((run)->run.player().message("Enter your own text to add to the format:")),
132                                                      new SwitchPageAction(menuName, menuPage))
133                                         .withSlot(5)
134                                         .build());
135
136      callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("BLACK_WOOL", 1)
137                                                         .customName(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.MyEco.Format.ResetDisplay"), id))
138                                                         .lore(Collections.singletonList(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.MyEco.Format.Reset"), id))))
139                                         .withClick((click)->click.player().viewer().ifPresent(menuViewer->menuViewer.addData(formatID, "")))
140                                         .withActions(new SwitchPageAction(menuName, menuPage))
141                                         .withSlot(6)
142                                         .build());
143
144      //TODO: Fix display
145      final Optional<Object> formatData = viewer.get().findData(formatID);
146      final Component display = (formatData.isPresent())? Component.text((String)formatData.get()) : MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.MyEco.Format.None"), id);
147
148      callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("ARROW", 1)
149                                                         .customName(display)
150                                                         .lore(Collections.singletonList(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.MyEco.Format.Format"), id))))
151                                         .withActions(new SwitchPageAction(menuName, menuPage))
152                                         .withSlot(4)
153                                         .build());
154
155      callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("BARRIER", 1)
156                                                         .customName(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.Shared.EscapeDisplay"), id))
157                                                         .lore(Collections.singletonList(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.Shared.Escape"), id))))
158                                         .withActions(new SwitchPageAction(returnMenu, returnPage))
159                                         .withSlot(1)
160                                         .build());
161
162      callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("ARROW", 1)
163                                                         .customName(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.Shared.Save"), id))
164                                                         .lore(Collections.singletonList(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.MyEco.Format.Save"), id))))
165                                         .withActions(new RunnableAction((click)->{
166
167                                           if(selectionListener != null) {
168
169                                             selectionListener.accept(new StringSelectionHandler(click, (String)viewer.get().dataOrDefault(formatID, "<symbol><major.amount><decimal><minor.amount>")));
170                                           }
171                                         }), new SwitchPageAction(returnMenu, returnPage))
172                                         .withSlot(7)
173                                         .build());
174
175
176      final String[] stringSet = CurrencyFormatter.rules().keySet().toArray(new String[CurrencyFormatter.rules().size()]);
177
178      final LinkedList<Component> lore = new LinkedList<>();
179      lore.add(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.MyEco.Format.Add"), id));
180      lore.add(Component.text("Placeholder"));
181
182      int slot = 9;
183      for(int i = start; i < start + items; i++) {
184        if(stringSet.length <= i) {
185          break;
186        }
187
188        final FormatRule rule = CurrencyFormatter.rules().get(stringSet[i]);
189
190        if(!rule.includeInMenu()) {
191          continue;
192        }
193
194        //reset lore to include description for each rule.
195        lore.set(1, Component.text(rule.description()));
196
197        callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("PAPER", 1)
198                                                           .customName(Component.text(rule.name()))
199                                                           .lore(lore))
200                                           .withActions(new SwitchPageAction(menuName, menuPage))
201                                           .withClick((click)->formatAddClick(click, rule.name()))
202                                           .withSlot(slot)
203                                           .build());
204
205        slot++;
206      }
207    }
208  }
209
210  private void formatAddClick(final MenuClickHandler click, final String toAdd) {
211
212    final Optional<MenuViewer> clickViewer = click.player().viewer();
213    clickViewer.ifPresent(menuViewer->addToClickData(menuViewer, toAdd));
214  }
215
216  protected void addToClickData(final MenuViewer viewer, final String toAdd) {
217
218    final String formatStr = (String)viewer.dataOrDefault(formatID, "");
219
220    viewer.addData(formatID, formatStr + toAdd);
221  }
222}
